definition: having or characterized by two names, especially those of genus and species in taxonomies, (mathematics) a quantity expressed as a sum or difference of two terms
details:
adjective
- having or characterized by two names, especially those of genus and species in taxonomies
= example: having or characterized by two names, especially those of genus and species in taxonomies
= synonyms: binominal
- of or relating to or consisting of two terms
= example: of or relating to or consisting of two terms
noun
- (mathematics) a quantity expressed as a sum or difference of two terms
